programme.desc: Tristans atgriežas Skeldeilā, bet viņa gultu un viņa brāli ir aizņēmis Kārmodijs! Džeims mēģina pārliecināt satraukto Sidu Krebtriju, kad tiek izsaukts pie slimas govs.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Kad tiek nogalināts burāšanas kluba loceklis, Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija ir spiestas tikt galā ar sarūgtinājumu mazajā kopienā, lai noskaidrotu patiesību.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla pavada lēdiju Virdžīniju Revelu uz viņas mājām. Grāfs Ludvigs tiek atrasts miris Entonija Keida rokās. Kāpēc Keids ir Čimniju mājās? Vai Virdžīnijas pielūdzējs tiek apsūdzēts slepkavībā?

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Grāmattārps
programme.desc: 2. pasaules kara laikā viesnīcā "Walsingham" ir daudz kas noticis, bet slepkavība? Kad kapteinis Ors saindējas ar kokteili viesnīcas bārā, šķiet, ka iespējamiem aizdomās turamiem nav gala.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Džoilons uzstāj, ka pildīs tēva pienākumus, kad Džeimss mēģina panākt viņa padzīšanu no uzņēmuma. Soames apsola Irēnai pārcelties uz Parīzi, lai atbalstītu viņas deju karjeru pirms laulībām.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Prezidents Puankrē piešķir Agnesei, Žannai, Margeritai un Karolīnai goda medaļas, tomēr visām prātā ir kas cits.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Francija, 1914. g. Stāsts par četrām sievietēm - Parīzes prostitūtu Margeritu, ģimenes galvu Karolīnu, klostera galveno māsu Agnesi un feministiski noskaņoto māsu Suzannu.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Kad tiek nogalināts burāšanas kluba loceklis, Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija ir spiestas tikt galā ar sarūgtinājumu mazajā kopienā, lai noskaidrotu patiesību.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārplas draugs tēvs Gormans tiek atrasts noslepkavots. Kad viņa saņem sarakstu ar vārdiem, ko Gormans nosūtījis brīdi pirms nāves, viņa apņemas atrast drauga slepkavu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Kad Skotlendjardā darbu sāk jauns detektīvinspektors, Elīzai Skārletai ir jācīnās, lai vēlreiz sevi pierādītu.

programme.title: Global Week-End
programme.desc: News stories as they happen. Analysis and coverage of the most important global events as they unfold providing insight into their significance and relevance for communities worldwide. From politics to society all that has an impact or will impact on the globe as a whole is presented in an accessible and insightful form to allow one to keep up-to-date on the factors changing the world we live in.

programme.title: Jumping | Riyadh Global Champions League | Event 16 | Round
Jumping | Riyadh Global Champions League | Event 16 | Round
Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Noble Things
programme.desc: Jimmy Wayne Collins finds himself adrift in Memphis, Tennessee. Forced to return home to the piney woods of Southeast Texas, Jimmy will face his imprisoned brother, his dying father and the demons he left behind.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: The Recall
programme.desc: When five friends vacation at a remote lake house they expect nothing less than a good time, unaware that planet Earth is under an alien invasion and mass-abduction.

programme.title: Love Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Samir, must face his parents breakup. While they meet to find the way to tell him, the little Samir surprises them, because he knows perfectly whats happening, putting his own parents into a hard place with his vision of the situation.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Bob and Amy are at a crossroads: she wants to adopt a child, he doesnt. Will renovating their house and rescuing animals solve their problems? Will their new handyman and his sons pregnant girlfriend be the miracle theyre looking for?...

programme.title: Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself among the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: A fisherman discovers an abandoned sailboat and decides to board. He finds no signs of life, but when he gets back on deck his own boat appears to have disappeared. What follows is an absolute nightmare.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: Lucia is an aging Italian actress and director (beautifully portrayed by Antonionis and Fellinis actress Lucia Bosa), decides to come back to the small town where she had spent her happy childhood. She wants to bring the TV where television has never been seen before. She reaches out to the women in the local community with a project that might change their lives forever.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: Donald P. Sinclair has placed six separate gold coins in different slot machines in his casino. The lucky six who find these coins discover an opportunity of a lifetime. The chance to own $2 million. Locked up in a locker in New Mexico, these six contestants must now race each other, to be the first to the cash. There are no rules in place and everything that could possibly happen, does. Whilst, behind the scenes, Sinclairs associates are placing their bets.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
Black Water
programme.desc: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: A man steps out of a park fountain in Ho Chi Minh City with no recollection of who he is or where he came from. As he wanders through the city, piecing together clues to his past, he is relentlessly pursued by mysterious figures.

programme.title: From the Shadows
programme.desc: Terri has a great life, a great boyfriend and she just won the lottery! Then she awakens to find herself in a dungeon being tortured by an insane doctor obsessed with his new date rape drug, in search of her winning lottery ticket. The horror she encounters is not only in front of her, but in the darkest recesses of her mind.

programme.title: Hipnotika
programme.desc: Apņēmības pilns atrast savu pazudušo meitu, detektīvs Denijs Rurks, izmeklējot virkni banku aplaupīšanu, attopas neparastu notikumu virpulī, līdz viņš sāk apšaubīt pat visvienkāršākos pieņēmumus par visu un ikvienu.

programme.desc: Skolas dzīve Nadīnei kļuvusi vēl nepanesamāka - viņas labākā draudzene Krista sāk satikties ar Nadīnes vecāko brāli.

programme.title: Naudas monstrs
programme.desc: Finanšu raidījumu vadītājs Lī Geits un viņa producente Petija nonāk ekstrēmā situācijā - kāds investors viņus un viņu komandu paņem gūstā.

programme.title: Saikne
programme.desc: Stāsts par seržantu Kinliju, kurš savā pēdējā norīkojumā Afganistānā nonāk komandā ar vietējo tulku Ahmedu. Kad viņu vienību patruļas laikā aplenc, Kinlijs un Ahmeds ir vienīgie izdzīvojušie, un Ahmeds riskē ar dzīvību, nogādājot ievainoto Kinliju drošībā.

programme.title: Labais medījums

Ādams ir 27 gadus vecs, talantīgs un veiksmīgs radio žurnālists. Vizītē pie ārsta puisis uzzina, ka viņam ir reta vēža forma, kas ir bīstama 50 % gadījumu.

programme.title: Viņš un viņa

programme.title: Eleonoras rigbijas pazušana
programme.desc: Kāda pāra stāsts, kuri mēģina atgūt savu dzīvi un mīlu, kas reiz viņiem bijusi, saglābjot pagātnes detaļas, kas varētu sen jau būt zudušas.

programme.title: Mans karalis. Drāma
programme.desc: Pēc nopietnas slēpošanas traumas Tonija nonākusi rehabilitācijas centrā. Atkarīga no medicīnas personāla un pretsāpju līdzekļiem, viņa velta laiku, lai atcerētos vētraino mīlasstāstu, ko piedzīvoja kopā ar Džordžio.

programme.title: Sirds pukst skaļi
programme.desc: Stāsts par neparastu tēva un meitas dziesminieku duetu vasarā pirms došanās uz koledžu.

programme.title: Eleonoras rigbijas pazušana
programme.desc: Kāda pāra stāsts, kuri mēģina atgūt savu dzīvi un mīlu, kas reiz viņiem bijusi, saglābjot pagātnes detaļas, kas varētu sen jau būt zudušas.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Battle Of the Decades
programme.desc: Thats Bologna!. The chefs take on ingredients that go back to the 1970s! Theyre challenged with using a fondue pot and later make their own version of chicken Kiev.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: Duff Goldman and his team square off against Henderson Gonzalezs team to make ocean predator cakes that feature a floating element.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: The Last Day of the Dictator
Kliko kundze
programme.desc: Pēc vīra pāragrās nāves Barba Nikola Ponsardēna Kliko pretstatā pieņemtajām normām pārņem jaunā vīndarīšanas uzņēmuma grožus, ko abi ar vīru bija veidojuši. Vadot uzņēmumu cauri politiskām un finanšu grūtībām, viņa ignorē kritiķus un rada revolūciju šampanieša industrijā, kļūstot par vienu no pasaules pirmajām, dižajām darījumu sievietēm. Filmas pamatā ir Tilaras Dž. Maceo "The New York Times" bestsellers "Atraitne Kliko".

programme.title: Advokāts
programme.desc: Bagāts un veiksmīgs advokāts taisās precēties ar savu līgavu, taču drīz vien iesaistās sarežģītā narkotiku darījumā ar starpnieku, kuru dēvē par Vestreju. Plāns piedzīvo šausmīgu pavērsienu, un puisim jāsargā sevi un topošo līgavu, jo atklājas patiesība par narkotiku biznesu, un liecinieki tiek likvidēti.

programme.title: Māceklis
programme.desc: Stāsts par meistaru un viņa mācekli Ņujorkas nekustamo īpašumu džungļos. 70. gadu sākumā Donalds Tramps ir iesācējs – kompleksu mākts lietu kārtotājs, kurš atrodas tētuka Trampa seniora pavēnī. Iepazīstoties ar advokātu Roju Konu, viņa dzīve mainās. Zogot no citiem idejas, spārnotus teicienus (arī no Reigana) un pārņemot Kona taktiku, Tramps kļūst par savu "labāko versiju". AIDS epidēmija, šovbiznesa ziedonis un itāļu marmora modernās pilis. Pilsēta, kas nekad neguļ, ir Trampa spēļu laukums – tiesa, tajā viņam pašam kļūst par šauru.

programme.title: Darba rūķis
programme.desc: Levons Keids pameta godalgotu militāro karjeru slepenajās operācijās, lai dzīvotu vienkāršu dzīvi, strādājot celtniecībā. Bet, kad viņa priekšnieka meitu, kas viņam ir kā radiniece, nolaupa cilvēku tirgotāji, viņš atklāj korupcijas pasauli, kas ir daudz lielāka, nekā viņš varēja iedomāties.

programme.title: Kapteinis Zobenzobs un burvju briljants
programme.desc: Ļaunais princis Megans Hans no džungļiem un Karību jūras pirāts kapteinis Zobenzobs jau sen dzen maģiskā briljanta pēdas. Tas nav parasts dārgakmens. Pusnaktī tas spēj piepildīt viskvēlāko vēlēšanos, lai kāda tā būtu. Visi meklējumi "kaķim zem astes", taču tad, klejodams pa džungļiem, burvju dārgakmeni nejauši ierauga mazais Marks.

programme.title: Džūdija
programme.desc: Leģendārā Džūdija Gārlenda 1968. gada ziemā ierodas Londonā, lai uzstātos izpārdotu koncertu sērijā.

programme.title: Relikviju mednieki
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par vērienīgākajām dārgumu medībām pasaules vēsturē. Pārsteidzoša Otrā pasaules kara karavīru komanda saņem pavēli izglābt nacistu nozagtos mākslas šedevrus un atgriezt tos īstajiem īpašniekiem. Uzdevums šķita neizpildāms, jo mākslas darbi atradās aiz ienaidnieka līnijas, un Vācijas armijai bija pavēlēts pēc Reiha krišanas iznīcināt absolūti visu. Vai tad muzeju direktori, kuratori un mākslas vēsturnieki, kuri labāk pārzināja Mikelandželo darbus, nevis ieročus, varēja cerēt uz izdošanos?

programme.title: Palaidnīgā feja
programme.desc: 337 gadus jaunajai zobu fejai Violetai maģija nešķiet īpaši aizraujoša, tāpēc viņa vienīgā nespēj nokārtot eksāmenu, lai iegūtu kristālu, kas fejām ļauj iekļūt cilvēku pasaulē. Violeta neļauj skumjām vaļu, nozog kristālu citai fejai un nokļūst 12 gadus vecās bārenītes Maksijas istabā. Tomēr, ak vai! Kristāls saplīst, un nu Violeta ir iesprostota cilvēku pasaulē! Kopā ar Maksiju viņa meklē atpakaļceļu un atklāj savu patieso aicinājumu.

programme.title: Zirnekļcilvēks: Atgriešanās mājās
programme.desc: Sajūsmināts par pavadīto laiku kopā ar Atriebējiem, Pīters Pārkers ir atgriezies mājās, kur dzīvo kopā ar tanti Meju sava jaunā mentora Tonija Stārka uzraudzībā. Viņš cenšas dzīvot vienkāršu pusaudža dzīvi, tomēr nespēj nedomāt par to, ka varētu būt sabiedrībai noderīgs ar savām supervaroņa spējām. Kad pie apvāršņa parādās ļaundaris, viņam būs iespēja tās likt lietā!

programme.title: Sātans "Pradas" brunčos
programme.desc: Žilbinošajā Ņujorkas modes pasaulē žurnāls "Runway" ir tikpat kā Svētā Grāla statusā. To ar manikirētu dūri vada Miranda Prīstlija – ietekmīgākā sieviete modes nozarē. "Runway" ir biedinošs izaicinājums jebkuram, kas vēlas gūt panākumus šai jomā. Lai padarītu "Runway" par Ņujorkas un tātad arī visas pasaules modes bībeli, Miranda nekam neļauj stāties sev ceļā – ieskaitot neskaitāmas asistentes, kas atlaistas, jo nav atbildušas neaptveramajām prasībām. Neviens sevi cienošs cilvēks nespētu paciest šādu darbu, tomēr miljoniem jaunu sieviešu šādas izdevības dēļ būtu gatavas uz visu.

programme.title: Džeisons Borns
programme.desc: Bijusī CIP slepenā aģente Nikija Pārsone (Džūlija Stailza) reiz palīdzēja Bornam (Mets Deimons), pēc tam nozuda un šobrīd strādā kopā ar ziņotāju, kurš gatavojas nodot atklātībā CIP slepenās specoperācijas. Nikija ielaužas CIP sistēmā un lejupielādē visu, kas saistīts ar specoperācijām, tostarp operāciju "Dzirnakmens", kurā piedalījās Borns. CIP aģente Hetera Lī (Alīsija Vikandere) atklāj ielaušanos un par to ziņo CIP direktoram Robertam Dūvijam (Tomijs Lī Džonss), kurš ir specoperāciju galvenais vadītājs.

programme.title: Atmiņas par nākotni
programme.desc: 1914. gadā, laužot pieņēmumus par sievieti tā laika sabiedrībā, Vera Britena kļūst par Somervilas koledžas studenti Oksfordā. Sākoties Pirmajam pasaules karam, viņas brālis Edvards, līgavainis Rolands Leitons un draugi Viktors un Džefrijs tiek nosūtīti cīnīties frontes priekšējās līnijās. Arī Vera ziedojas un atstāj koledžu, lai dotos līdzi un pievienotos brīvprātīgo mediķu organizācijai, rūpējoties par ievainotajiem un mirstošajiem kareivjiem Londonā, Maltā un Francijā.

programme.title: Vindrivera
programme.desc: Sniegotā līdzenumā indiāņu rezervātā "Vindrivera" pēddzinis un mednieks Korijs Lamberts atrod jaunas sievietes līķi. Kad autopsijā atklājas, ka sieviete tikusi izvarota, vietējais šerifs lūdz FIB palīdzību. Lai izmeklētu notikušo, no Lasvegasas uz indiāņu rezervātu tiek nosūtīta FIB aģente Džeina Benere. Drīz atklājas, ka viņa ieradusies nesagatavota - gan skarbajam apvidum, gan gaidāmajai cīņai par patiesību un izdzīvošanu.

programme.title: Eilīna
programme.desc: Eilīna strādā zēnu pāraudzināšanas iestādē. Kad kolektīvam pievienojas jauna psiholoģe, Eilīnai ar viņu rodas īpašs kontakts. Bet viņu attiecības pavisam drīz uzņem grēcīgu pavērsienu.

programme.title: Ielu karaļi
programme.desc: Losandželosas policijas departamenta veterāns Toms Ladlovs (Keanu Rīvss) ir pieredzējis ļaunāko, kas redzams uz ielām. Kad viņa pārinieks iet bojā, viņš ielu vardarbību sāk uztvert personiski. Ladlovam uzdod saukt sava pārinieka slepkavu pie atbildības, taču policijas kapteinis (Forests Vitakers) ir noraizējies, ka karstgalvīgais izmeklētājs ir pārāk personiski iesaistīts lietā. Ladlovs nolīgst jauno slepkavību nodaļas izmeklētāju Diskantu, lai sadzītu pēdas viņa pārinieka slepkavām Losandželosas ielās.

programme.title: Misija: Titāns
programme.desc: Psiholoģiskajā trillerī "Misija: Titāns" ar Keisiju Afleku un Lorensu Fišbērnu galvenajās lomās elitāru astronautu trio dodas gadiem ilgā, iespējams, kompromitētā misijā uz Saturna mēnesi Titānu. Kad ekipāža gatavojas veikt ļoti bīstamo paātrinājumu, kas tos var nogādāt pie Titāna vai arī aizsūtīt dziļi kosmosā, vienam astronautam kļūst arvien grūtāk saglabāt saikni ar realitāti.

programme.title: Palaidnīgā feja
programme.desc: 337 gadus jaunajai zobu fejai Violetai maģija nešķiet īpaši aizraujoša, tāpēc viņa vienīgā nespēj nokārtot eksāmenu, lai iegūtu kristālu, kas fejām ļauj iekļūt cilvēku pasaulē. programme.title: Atmiņas par nākotni
programme.desc: 1914. gadā, laužot pieņēmumus par sievieti tā laika sabiedrībā, Vera Britena kļūst par Somervilas koledžas studenti Oksfordā. Sākoties Pirmajam pasaules karam, viņas brālis Edvards, līgavainis Rolands Leitons un draugi Viktors un Džefrijs tiek nosūtīti cīnīties frontes priekšējās līnijās. Arī Vera ziedojas un atstāj koledžu, lai dotos līdzi un pievienotos brīvprātīgo mediķu organizācijai, rūpējoties par ievainotajiem un mirstošajiem kareivjiem Londonā, Maltā un Francijā.

programme.title: Bridžitas Džounsas dienasgrāmata
programme.desc: Bridžeta Džonsa ir jauna sieviete, kas pārdzīvo savu vecumu, svaru, darbu, neveiksmes privātajā dzīvē un citas nepilnības. Pienākot Jaunajam gadam, viņa apņemas beidzot sakārtot savu dzīvi, sākt rakstīt pilnīgi atklātu dienasgrāmatu. Dzīve uzņem apgriezienus, kas viņa sāk romānu ar savu bosu, kas izrādās vienkāršs brunču mednieks, un satiek otru savas dzīves vīrieti, kas izskatās diezgan garlaicīgs, tomēr ir lielisks.

programme.title: Bridžita Džounsa 2. Saprāta robeža
programme.desc: Bridžita Džonsa ir kā apreibusi no attiecībām ar Marku Dārsiju. Viņš ir izglītots, gādīgs un arī iecietīgs pret katru (gandrīz) Bridžitas greizsirdības lēkmi. Kādēļ gan lai ikviena Londonas sieviete nekristu kārdinājumā atņemt Marku tuklajai, ietiepīgajai un dažreiz nepiedienīgajai Bridžitai? Kad pie apvāršņa parādās garkājaina asistente, rozā mākonītis virs Bridžitas galvas savelkas aizdomīgi pelēks, un viņa ar skubu metas pārbaudīt abu attiecības. Taču, kad Bridžitai šķiet, ka sliktāk vairs nevar būt, parādās viņas bijušais priekšnieks, brunču mednieks un siržu lauzējs Daniels Klīvers.

programme.title: Bridžitas Džounsas mazulis
programme.desc: Bridžitai Džounsai (Renē Zelvēgere) paliek 43 gadi, un viņas māte Pamela (Džemma Džounsa) atgādina, ka bioloģiskais pulkstenis tikšķ. Apmeklējot kāda drauga bēres, kurš gājis bojā lidmašīnas katastrofā, viņa satiek savu bijušo – Marku Darsiju (Kolins Fērts), kurš ir kopā ar sievu Kamillu (Agni Skota). Pēc bēru ceremonijas viņa dodas uz pašreizējo darbu, kurā strādā par draudzenes un TV diktores Mirandas (Sāra Solemani) producenti. Viņa uzaicina Bridžitu nosvinēt neseno dzimšanas dienu, taču Bridžita atsaka, jo grasās to svinēt ar draugiem. Taču viņa paliek viena, jo visi draugi ir aizņemti ar saviem bērniem. Viņa bēdīga pieņem Mirandas piedāvājumu, un abas dodas uz mūzikas festivālu. Nepaiet ilgs laiks, līdz Bridžita ar seju iekrīt dubļos, taču viņai palīdz glīts svešinieks. Vēlāk festivāla laikā viņa piedzeras un nokļūst nepareizajā teltī, pārsteigta satiekot vīrieti, kurš viņai palīdzēja. Viņiem ir sekss. Nākamajā rītā viņa klusām aizlavās. Bridžita dodas uz kristībām, kurās viņa ir krustmāte un Marks ir krusttēvs. Viņš atklāj Bridžitai, ka šķirsies ar Kamillu. Viņiem ir sekss. Tad viņa atceras, ka viņš vienmēr darbu vērtēja augstāk par abu attiecībām, un no rīta klusām aizlavās, pirms viņš ir pamodies. Kad Bridžita pamana, ka pieņemas svarā, viņas draudzene Šazera (Sallija Filipsa) pārliecina veikt grūtniecības testu. Tests ir pozitīvs. Strādājot pie raidījuma, viņa pamana svešinieku no festivāla un pārsteigta uzzina, ka viņš ir miljardieris Džeks Kvants (Patriks Dempsijs). Viņa tam atklāj, ka ir stāvoklī. Neskatoties uz sākotnējo šoku, Džeks apsola viņu atbalstīt. To pašu pasaka Markam, kurš ir sajūsmā, ka kļūs par tēvu. Bridžita uzaicina Džeku uz pasākumu, un atklāj, ka tajā piedalās arī Marks. Abi vīrieši labi saprotas, un viņi visi kopā dodas vakariņās. Viņa atklāj, ka jebkurš no tiem var būt tēvs. Džeks to uztver labi, taču Marks aiziet. Mēnešiem ritot, Marks atjauno sakarus. Kļūdas dēļ Bridžita pamet darbu. Kā bezdarbniece viņa nomākta klīst pa lietu...

programme.title: Bridžita Džounsa: Kā traka pēc viņa
programme.desc: Bridžita atkal ir viena un audzina 9 gadus veco Billiju un 4 gadus veco Meibelu. Iestrēgusi emocionālā nestabilitātē, viņa audzina bērnus ar uzticīgā drauga un bijušā mīļākā Daniela Klīvera palīdzību. Taču tad viņas dzīvē negaidīti uzrodas vēl kāds vīrietis.

programme.title: Nerunā ļaunu
programme.desc: Kad amerikāņu ģimene tiek uzaicināta pavadīt nedēļas nogali idilliskā lauku īpašumā, kas pieder jaukai britu ģimenei, ar ko viņi iepazinās atvaļinājumā, viss sākas kā bezrūpīgas sapņu brīvdienas un drīz pārvēršas urdošā psiholoģiskā murgā.

programme.title: Sisu
programme.desc: Dziļi Lapzemes savvaļā Aatami Korpi meklē zeltu. Kad viņš sastopas ar nacistu patruļu, sākas elpu aizraujoša un pēc zelta alkstoša vajāšana pa iznīcināto un mīnēto Lapzemes mežonīgo savvaļu.

programme.title: Sarkanā Džoana
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par krievu spiedzi, kas novērsa Trešo Pasaules karu. Britu izlūkdienests ilgus gadus centās viņu atklāt, viņas vārds kļuva par leģendu. Tomēr par šo viņas varoņdarbu sabiedrība uzzināja pavisam nesen, kad lietai tika noņemts slepenības grifs.

programme.title: Taisnīguma bruņinieki
programme.desc: Galvenā varoņa sieva iet bojā dzelzceļa katastrofā. Tā sākas stāsts par trakāko un atriebīgāko izmeklēšanu, uz ko spējīga karavīra, hakera un divu dīvainu matemātiķu kompānija.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Olympiacos Piraeus - AS Monaco
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: NBA. Boston Celtics - Cleveland Cavaliers
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Real Betis - Atletico Madrid
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

Basketbols: Eirolīga. Olympiacos - AS Monaco
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Cheap Old Houses
programme.desc: Cheap Old Houses is inspired by Ethan and Elizabeth Finkelsteins uber popular Instagram feed by the same name, which racks up millions of views with images of surprising property bargains that are architecturally intact and available for under $150,000. In each episode, cameras will follow the couple as they tour low-priced older houses across America and ultimately choose which ones to feature on their famous site.

programme.title: Cheap Old Houses
programme.desc: Cheap Old Houses is inspired by Ethan and Elizabeth Finkelsteins uber popular Instagram feed by the same name, which racks up millions of views with images of surprising property bargains that are architecturally intact and available for under $150,000. In each episode, cameras will follow the couple as they tour low-priced older houses across America and ultimately choose which ones to feature on their famous site.

programme.title: Fix My Flip
programme.desc: Real estate broker Page Turner brings her team, money, and tough love to help overwhelmed flippers get their wayward projects back on track.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Mexico Life

Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International
programme.desc: A spin-off of My Lottery Dream Home that follows British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen as he tries to help a number of lottery winners from Europe find a perfect home. Dive into the exciting world of real estate, and join Laurence as he travels across the United Kingdom and Europe looking for amazing properties for his clients - from castles, mansions, to cottages, and much more.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: Windy City Rehab
programme.desc: Windy City Rehab is a reality renovation show hosted by interior designer Alison Victoria. She and her expert team buy and restore old homes in her beloved Chicago historic neighborhoods. It is much more than a simple improvement of a house. Alison and her team are rescuing vintage houses and hold true to the original style and architecture as much as possible. They do their best to pay tribute to the historic roots, while integrating some modern makeovers.

programme.title: Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: American reality television series. Married couple Chip and Johanna Gaines own a home renovation and redecoration service in Waco, Texas, and had worked on over 100 homes before the show. They begin with showing a hopeful couple three potential homes to purchase in central Texas, all of which require a significant amount of repair or renovation. Once the couple have chosen the home they like, Johanna designs the renovations and Chip is the lead contractor. Buyers usually have an overall budget of under $200,000 with at least $30,000 in renovations.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Cheap Old Houses
programme.desc: Cheap Old Houses is inspired by Ethan and Elizabeth Finkelsteins uber popular Instagram feed by the same name, which racks up millions of views with images of surprising property bargains that are architecturally intact and available for under $150,000. In each episode, cameras will follow the couple as they tour low-priced older houses across America and ultimately choose which ones to feature on their famous site.

programme.title: Cheap Old Houses

programme.title: Fix My Flip
programme.desc: Page helps a flipper with a massive project, but receives major pushback.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Mike and Denese take on one of their most eclectic houses yet with a fridge in the living room, an unusable kitchen and a hidden walled-off fireplace.

programme.title: Scariest House In America
programme.desc: Retta tours spooky properties nominated by their haunted homeowners. The most terrifying home wins a renovation revival from Alison Victoria!

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International
programme.desc: A spin-off of My Lottery Dream Home that follows British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen as he tries to help a number of lottery winners from Europe find a perfect home. Dive into the exciting world of real estate, and join Laurence as he travels across the United Kingdom and Europe looking for amazing properties for his clients - from castles, mansions, to cottages, and much more.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International
programme.desc: A spin-off of My Lottery Dream Home that follows British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen as he tries to help a number of lottery winners from Europe find a perfect home. Dive into the exciting world of real estate, and join Laurence as he travels across the United Kingdom and Europe looking for amazing properties for his clients - from castles, mansions, to cottages, and much more.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: We Bought A Funeral Home
programme.desc: The Blumbergs transform a Victorian funeral parlour into their dream home. But strange and unexplained noises have them questioning their decision.

programme.title: We Bought A Funeral Home
programme.desc: Living through a funeral home renovation proves to be nerve-racking. Plus, the old embalming area is turned into a speakeasy with a luxe cigar lounge.

programme.title: We Bought A Funeral Home
programme.desc: The parlour gets a Victorian-glam makeover that includes a secret doorway. And, a former resident of the home drops by and shares some ghostly information.

programme.title: We Bought A Funeral Home
programme.desc: After months without a kitchen, the main floor gets a gothic-glam makeover. Also, an investigation of the homes haunted past kicks into high gear.

programme.title: We Bought A Funeral Home
programme.desc: The Blumbergs love for Halloween leads them to transform the Victorian home into a spectacular Creepy Clown Carnival that wows trick-or-treaters.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Human bones as a "miracle cure" for gout? Living mummies buried alive? A truly bizarre Victorian way to lose weight with tapeworms? From daily rites to once-in-a-lifetime rituals, the stranger side of human nature is revealed in these rituals.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: On February 24, 1942, military radar picks up what appears to be enemy aircraft over Los Angeles. Sirens send citizens scrambling, as troops fire artillery at the illusive targets. What exactly triggered the so-called Battle of Los Angeles?

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates mysteries surrounding the work of inventor Nikola Tesla, one of the most important and eccentric scientists in history. In the late 19th and early 20th century, Nikola Tesla invented alternating current, developed radio and cell phone technology, conceived of wireless electricity, remote control and electric cars, and devised a mega-weapon more deadly than the atomic bomb. Researcher Marc Seifer, astrophysicist Travis Taylor, and investigative journalist Jason Stapleton try to unravel the mystery of Teslas missing files, which were confiscated by the US government after he died in 1943. Did they contain his plans for free worldwide electricity? Or his designs for a death ray? Tune in and find out!

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Chimpanzees are known to us as amusing circus attractions and are even popular as pets, but when they attack the results are frightening and horrific. Just as disturbing, across the US, witness reports suggest that chimpanzees may be on the loose.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates mysteries surrounding the work of inventor Nikola Tesla, one of the most important and eccentric scientists in history. In the late 19th and early 20th century, Nikola Tesla invented alternating current, developed radio and cell phone technology, conceived of wireless electricity, remote control and electric cars, and devised a mega-weapon more deadly than the atomic bomb. Researcher Marc Seifer, astrophysicist Travis Taylor, and investigative journalist Jason Stapleton try to unravel the mystery of Teslas missing files, which were confiscated by the US government after he died in 1943. Did they contain his plans for free worldwide electricity? Or his designs for a death ray? Tune in and find out!

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Chimpanzees are known to us as amusing circus attractions and are even popular as pets, but when they attack the results are frightening and horrific. Just as disturbing, across the US, witness reports suggest that chimpanzees may be on the loose.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Documentary series in which YouTube sensation Beau Ouimette, an experienced river detectorist, teams up with presenter Rick Edwards, to search the UKs rivers and waterways in an attempt to find underwater archaeological treasures. The pair wil visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain, where some iconic events and battles took place. By using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, they will find various artefacts under layers of silt and rocks, which they will take to local archaeologists and historians to uncover the stories behind the finds.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: There have been stories for centuries about huge, aggressive albino sperm whales. They were immortalised by the novel "Moby Dick." These stories told of whales targeting ships and ramming them with their huge heads. Could stories like this be true?

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Search for the Lost Giants follows two brothers on their quest to find lost giants. According to the Bible there were ancient giants wandering along the Earth. A few years ago some Freemasons found stone structures and corridors underground that indicated a lost civilization. programme.title: Chasing Mummies

programme.title: Warriors

programme.title: River Hunters

programme.title: Dead Silent
programme.desc: This docu-series takes the viewer on a disturbing psychological journey into the dark and foreboding world of true crimes carried out in lonesome and desolate locations. From hikers hearing a twig snap in a remote forest, to a mysterious stranger disrupting a fishing trip at an isolated campsite, or a young couples desperate fight for survival at a secluded lovers lane, this series examines the terrifying reality of being alone in a life-threatening situation. Each episode focuses on one specific case and uses eyewitness accounts from survivors, expert analysis from criminologists and psychologists, and commentary from local authorities to provide context and authenticity to these truly horrifying tales.

programme.title: Murder Calls
programme.desc: Murder Calls is a true-crime documentary series that explores the importance of the 911 calls made to the emergency services. Each episode features the chilling calls themselves, as detectives and investigators use the given information to help them track, trace and identify the potential killers. Using extensive reenactments, Murder Calls recreates aspects of the haunting murders, showing the twists and turns detectives face as they aim to understand the motive and identify the culprits. As with many murder cases, nothing at first is what it seems.

programme.title: A Body in the Basement

programme.title: The Tech Bro Murders
programme.desc: After a Silicon Valley couple splits, a custody dispute turns deadly, and police uncover a tangled case involving affairs, money, and lies.

programme.title: I Almost Got Away With It
programme.desc: Different crimes, different stories one clear motive: to stay out of prison. This series profiles true stories of the accused, who tried to avoided arrest and capture for their crime. Almost getting away with it. Following these convicts and their attempts and successions of escaping American prisons after being sentenced. Some are on the run for only a week, others evade the law for years and in rare cases even for decades. What pushed these fugitives to crime and to what extent are willing to go to avoid justice.

programme.title: Raw Terror
programme.desc: The burdening emotions of losing a loved one is a painful, all-consuming recovery process, but when that relative or friend was tragically murdered, the process of closure becomes far more difficult. This documentary series focusses on stories of everyday people who have been emotionally flattened following the murder of a loved one. With intimate and personal self-shot footage, the deceaseds family and friends detail their experiences with overcoming the devastation of losing someone close to their heart, as the series examines both the murder cases and the lasting after-effects.

programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. Episodes reveal true stories such as when an Oklahoma familys dog drops a human skull onto their porch and the police are called in to investigate; a bride-to-be who discovers her betrothed shot in the head in their living room; a beloved father, son and fiancee who is discovered beaten to death in his own driveway; and a devoted family man who diappears after his truck is set on fire.

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: As we all know, the initial verdict in a trial is not always the final outcome as many trial jury decisions are often overturned on appeal. However, the appeals process can take a significant amount of time to go through the system and also incur enormous costs on the individuals involved. This show follows the work of two investigators who re-examine the verdicts in contentious murder cases and assess the prospects of a successful appeal for the families of the people convicted of the crimes to determine if they should appeal or accept the verdict. Each episode traces the developments in the case, whether it be new evidence or witness testimony, which can then shed light on the innocence of the convicted person or show that, indeed, they are guilty of the crime and the verdict was correct.
